Header: Monument erected in memory of Major Wasantha Dinesh Jayawickrema who sacrificed his life in Mali
Content: A Ranaviru Monument erected in memory of Major Wasantha Dinesh Jayawickrema who sacrificed his life in Mali in between a peacekeeping operation has been unveiled. Major Wasantha Jayawickrema affiliated to the 11th Battalion of Sri Lanka Light Infantry was killed in a bomb attack while engaging in peace keeping operations in Mali. The Monument erected in the Abhayapura village within the Lankapura Divisional Secretariat Division in Polonnaruwa in his remembrance was unveiled by Col D.N.K. Bandara of the 23rd Battalion. A large gathering including family members joined in the occasion.
